discussiontools-autotopicsubpopup-body: Sɛ obi de nsɛm foforɔ to mpɛnsɛmpɛnsɛmu adaka yi mu a wɔbɛnya nkaebɔ. Wobɛtumi asesa baabi biribi kɔso wɔ wo nkaebɔ nom sɛnea wopɛ no.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-talkpages}}|Nkitaho bea]] {{SITENAME}} ɛyɛ bea a amanfoɔ di dwumadie ahodoɔ ho nkɔmmɔ  ne kwan a ɛbesi pi. Wo bɛtumi  ne afoforɔ de saa ɔfa yi afiti nkɔmmɔbɔ ase akyerɛ sɛnea [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}]] ebetu mpɔn.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self: Nnipa ɛwɔ {{SITENAME}} bɛtumi de  [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|kasa bia]] asuma amansan kaseɛbɔ ama wo na wobɛ nya nkaebɔ sɛ ɔmo yɛ a.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-self-ano:
Nnipa a wɔ ha {{SITENAME}} bɛtumi de [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|kasa bia]] asuma amansan kaseɛbɔ a ɛkyerɛ sesa yɛ a ɛwɔ IP akyerakwan a wode di dwuma.

Dodoɔ IP akyerɛkan sesa meretiamu, na mpɛn pii no nnipa dodoɔ no kyɛ. Wobɛtumi [$1 abue account] anaa [$2 bɛwura mu] sɛ neɛ bɛ ya ɛnfa mpenkyenpenkyenmu ma wɔn a apue dada no. Wobue account no sea wo IP akwankyerɛ.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage}}|Kasa biaeɛ]] yɛ babia nnipa totoa adwene wɔ kwan a wɔbtumi ayɛ biaeɛ {{SITENAME}} ɛyɛ papa. Hyɛ adwenkyerɛ foforɔ a ɛbua kwan na ɛde nkabom {{GENDER:{{PAGENAME}}|with}} [[:{{SUBJECTPAGENAME}}|{{PAGENAME}}]]. Deɛ wobɛka wɔ ha bɛda adi ama amansan ahunu.
discussiontools-emptystate-desc-user-ano: [[{{MediaWiki:discussiontools-emptystate-link-userpage-anon}}|Kasa biaeɛ]] yɛ biaeɛ nnipa bɛtumi atoatoa adwene a wobɛyɛ biaeɛ {{SITENAME}} ɛbɛ yɛ papa paa. Fa saa biaeɛ hyɛ adwenkyere a ɛba ma w'atumi asesa nnoɔma a ɛwɔ IP akwankyeremu. Deɛ wo beka wɔ ha beda adi ama amansan ahunu. Dodoɔ IP akwankyerɛ sesa meretiamu mu, na mpɛn pii no afoforɔ kyɛ.
discussiontools-error-comment-conflict: Wa dwenkyerɛ no ntumi sea, firi sɛ obi foforɔ akyerɛ na dwene saa bia naa mu. Nti sane bue bia no foforɔ anaa hwɛ adwenkerɛ foforɔ no.
discussiontools-error-comment-disappeare: Yɛ ntumi nhunu wa dwenkyerɛ a wode bua saa biaeɛ ha. Ɛbia apepa anaa sɛ afiri ha kɔ biaeɛ foforɔ.
Mepakyaw saa bue bia ha na yɛ biem.
discussiontools-preference-autotopicsub-: Sɛ wohyɛ nkɔmɔdi foforɔ ase anaa sɛ woka biribi fa nkɔmɔdi bi a ɛwɔ hɔ dada ho a, sɛ afoforɔ ka nsɛm foforɔ fa ho a wɔ aberɛ a w'ani nna woho so no wobɛnya nkaebɔ
discussiontools-replywidget-terms-click: Sɛ wo mia "$1" so a, wagye mmra a ɛfa wiki wei so nyinaa atumu
discussiontools-replywidget-transcluded: Yɛ bɛ kora wo mmuae no wɔ
discussiontools-replywidget-watchthis: Fa kratafa yi ka [[Special:Watchlist|nea w'ani wɔ ho no so]]
discussiontools-target-comment-missing: Nsɛmkaae yi nni hɔ. Ebɛtumi aba sɛ w'apepa anaa wayi akɔ baabi foforɔ.
discussiontools-topicsubscription-action: Wo nni nyinasosɛm yi akyi anaa?
discussiontools-topicsubscription-button: Di akyi na wo nsa aka mmuae foforɔ ho nkaebo
Nni akyi na si nkaebɔ ano
discussiontools-topicsubscription-error-: Y3 anhunu neɛ wo di akyiri no
discussiontools-topicsubscription-notify: W'nsa nka nsusuiɛ foforɔ ho nkaebɔ wɔ nnyinasosɛm yi ho
W'nsa nka nsusuiɛ foforɔ ho nkaebɔ wɔ nnyinasosɛm yi ho
discussiontools-topicsubscription-specia:
Nneɛma a wo nsa wɔ aseɛ no boa ma wo di nkɔmmɔ bi akyi wɔ nkɔmmɔdi bea hɔ. Sɛ obi bua nyinasosɛm no ano a, wo b3 nnya nkaebɔ.

Sesa kwan ne bea a wo nsa nkaebɔ yi ɛwc
Nyinasosɛm a wo nsa hy3 aseɛ
echo-pref-tooltip-dt-subscription: Bɔ me kɔkɔ sɛ obi twerɛ mmuae foforɔ wɔ nyinasosɛm bi a wo nsa hyɛ aseɛ
tag-discussiontools-added-comment-descri: Nkɔmmɔdi bea mmuae abɛka saa nsesae yi mu
tag-discussiontools-description: Wɔ de nkɔmmɔdie akade na yɛɛ nsakyerae
tag-discussiontools-edit-description: Dwumadifoɔ de nkɔmmɔdie akade sesaa mmuae a ɛwɔ hɔ dada
tag-discussiontools-newtopic-description: Dwumadifoɔ yi nnam nkɔmmɔdie akade de nyinasos3m foforɔ kaa ɔfa yi ho
tag-discussiontools-reply-description: Dwumadifoɔ no de nkɔmmɔdie akade yii asɛmbisa bi ano
tag-discussiontools-source-description: Na nkɔmmɔdie akade wɔ bea a ne ti firi
tag-discussiontools-source-enhanced-desc: Na nkɔmmɔdie akade wɔ bea ɛfiri no akade akorade
tag-discussiontools-visual-description: Akadeɛ a wo betumi de adi nkɔmmɔ no yɛ neɛ wo de w'ani hunu
